channel.title: [Help]Case 122 use item trouble

item.title: [Help]Case 122 use item trouble
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

I have a delta base server, and my potions.java handler doesn’t work.

I’m getting the error: cannot find symbol, variable itemID for server.potions.buryItem(itemID, ItemSlot, playerId);

My case 122 in client.java:

case 122: // Call item uses actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); server.potions.buryItem(itemID, ItemSlot, playerId);

My buryItem void in potions.java:

public void buryItem(int item, int slot, int ID) { boolean used = true; client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID]; if (item != c.playerItems[slot] - 1){ return; } if (c.playerHasItem(item)) { switch (item) {

Read full topic
